remarks: Version of ~ iscatd with a uniform assumption list, for increased proof sharing capabilities.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jan-2017.)
statement:
iscatd2.b $e |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` C ) ) $.
iscatd2.h $e |- ( ph -> H = ( Hom ` C ) ) $.
iscatd2.o $e |- ( ph -> .x. = ( comp ` C ) ) $.
iscatd2.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. V ) $.
iscatd2.ps $e |- ( ps <-> ( ( x e. B /\ y e. B ) /\ ( z e. B /\ w e. B ) /\ ( f e. ( x H y ) /\ g e. ( y H z ) /\ k e. ( z H w ) ) ) ) $.
iscatd2.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ y e. B ) -> .1. e. ( y H y ) ) $.
iscatd2.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ps ) -> ( .1. ( <. x , y >. .x. y ) f ) = f ) $.
iscatd2.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ps ) -> ( g ( <. y , y >. .x. z ) .1. ) = g ) $.
iscatd2.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ps ) -> ( g ( <. x , y >. .x. z ) f ) e. ( x H z ) ) $.
iscatd2.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ps ) -> ( ( k ( <. y , z >. .x. w ) g ) ( <. x , y >. .x. w ) f ) = ( k ( <. x , z >. .x. w ) ( g ( <. x , y >. .x. z ) f ) ) ) $.
iscatd2 $p |- ( ph -> ( C e. Cat /\ ( Id ` C ) = ( y e. B |-> .1. ) ) ) $.
$d .1. f g k w x z $.
$d .x. f g k w x y z $.
$d B f g k w x y z $.
$d C g k w y z $.
$d H f g k w x y z $.
$d f g k ph w x y z $.
